plot: Bernie Waldoff, of Bernie Waldoff Investment Securities IOU Capital, receives a surprise visit from the Securities Exchange Commission, SEC, and he scrambles to make sure that his company looks legit enough as to not raise suspicion.
title: Bernie Waldoff Investment Securities IOU Capital
